meanings.definition: To give new life or energy to
meanings.sent1: The fresh air revivifies the tired plants in the garden.
meanings.sent2: Exercise revivifies our bodies and makes us feel more alive.
meanings.sent3: The magical potion revivifies the old wizard, making him young again.
meanings.sent4: Laughter is like a medicine that revivifies the spirit.
meanings.sent5: The sunrise revivifies the world, bringing light and warmth to all.

meanings.definition: To restore to life or consciousness
meanings.sent1: The doctor revivifies the patient after a successful surgery.
meanings.sent2: CPR can revivify someone who has stopped breathing.
meanings.sent3: The prince's kiss revivifies the sleeping princess in the fairy tale.
meanings.sent4: Music has the power to revivify memories long forgotten.
meanings.sent5: The rain revivifies the parched earth, bringing it back to life.
